definitions: the operation or activity of two or more things at the same time or rate

examples.text: lack of synchronization between the dancers made it look clumsy
the operations required a high degree of synchronization between the parties

shortDefinitions: operation or activity of two or more things at same time or rate

definitions: adjustment of a clock or watch to show the same time as another
shortDefinitions: adjustment of clock or watch to show same time as another

definitions: the action of causing a set of data or files to remain identical in more than one location

examples.text: folder synchronization allows users on different computers to use shared data sources
easy synchronization with other wireless devices

shortDefinitions: action of causing data to remain identical in more than one location
